properties.areaDesc: Waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 3:00PM EST until January 5 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with
frequent gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6 to 9 feet expected. For
the first Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 20 kt with
gusts up to 25 kt and seas around 3 feet. For the second Small
Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt
and seas 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL from
20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 10 AM
EST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 PM EST this
evening. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM Sunday to 1
AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SUNDAY TO 1 AM EST MONDAY
